Class GramSchmidtProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.math.matrix.GramSchmidtProcess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<double[],no.uib.cipr.matrix.Vector[]>

    public class GramSchmidtProcess
extends Object
implements Function<double[],no.uib.cipr.matrix.Vector[]>
    Perform the Gram-Schmid process on a vector, returning the orthogonal basis set whose first vector is the input http://zintegra.net/archives/738
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
